CustomField.description: Used when the partner’s preferred method of connectivity does not align with the standard options (PMS, Channel Manager, or Manual Upload). This may include custom integrations or other unique solutions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this box if the partner’s preferred connectivity method does not fall under Property Management System (PMS), Channel Manager, or Manual Upload. This option is for non-standard or unique methods.
CustomField.label: Preferred Connectivity (Other)
